KakuroImprovedPackage

Class BoardModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • KakuroImprovedPackage.BoardModel

  • class BoardModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Class of board in Model, hold 2D array of fields and number of set used in game. Used also to generate board and write it to file.
    Author:
    Julita O³tusek

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private FieldModel[][] board
      2D Table with fields containing correct and user solution
      (package private) static int BOARD_SIZE

      Number of files with different boards (serialized objects of type FieldModel)
      private int numberOfSet
      Size of the table above

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentBoardState

        public FieldModel[][] getCurrentBoardState()

        Returns:
        2D array which is board of fields

      • setCurrentBoardState

        public void setCurrentBoardState(int a,
                                 int b,
                                 int c)
        Update user solutions in 2D array which is board in Model.
        Parameters:
        a - user solution
        b - horizontal index of 2D array
        c - vertical index of 2D array

      • getnumberOfSet

        public int getnumberOfSet()
        Returns:
        number of set of Kakuro puzzle, set with board

        public boolean isSolutionCorrect()
        Check if user solutions are the same like correct solutions
        Returns:
        weather solution entered by the User is correct or not

      • drawBoardFile

        public java.lang.String drawBoardFile()
        Draw number of set with board and name of file containing serialized package of objects of type FieldModel
        Returns:
        name of the drawn file (random board)
